News.headline: The Emirates FA Cup: Dagenham & Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.page_title: The Emirates FA Cup: Dagenham & Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.URL_keywords: The Emirates FA Cup: Dagenham & Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Dagger's 4th qualifying round game in the FA Cup against Wealdstone on Saturday 15th October.
News.description:
Don't miss out on our reduced prices for our Emirates FA Cup clash with Wealdstone FC where season tickets are not valid for cup games, so make sure you get your tickets for tomorrows game.

Please note that the Family Stand will be closed for this game and Junior & Under 10 tickets are reduced to £1.00 in advance but go up to £5.00 on the day.

Admission prices for the game:

Carling & TBS Stand:
Adults - £12.00
Concessions - £8.00
10-16 - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day
Under 10's - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day
*when purchased with an adult ticket.

Terraces:
Adults - £10.00
Concessions - £6.00
10-16 - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day
Under 10s - £1.00* in advance £5.00 on the day
*when purchased with an adult ticket.

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop.

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21
Club shop: Opening Times

Please note that in the event of a replay the prices for the game at Wealdstone will be:
Adults - £13.00
Concessions (Over 65) - £8.00
Under 18 - £3.00
